definition.value: Odi nkonim: Woayɛ nsakrae wɔ 2Checkout akontaabu ho nsɛm mu!

Sɛ wode saa ntrɛwmu yi di dwuma a wubetumi de 2Checkout payment system adi dwuma de agye sikatua afi w’atɔfo hɔ.
Kyerɛw wo din kwa nnɛ! Fa promo code ABANTECART2CO di dwuma ma wogyae wo application service fee (a wobɛkora sika $10.99) na fi ase tɔn wɔ intanɛt so nnɛ! Kɔ www.2checkout.com , hyehyɛ application no, na afei hyɛ code no mu wɔ promo code field no mu na woanya mfasoɔ wɔ saa offer soronko yi mu nnɛ!
Sɛ wokyerɛw wo din wie a, kɔ mu na woanya akonta ho adansedi krataa de asiesie saa ntrɛwmu yi
Mma wo werɛ mmfi sɛ wobɛhyehyɛ INS URL ne Redirect URL wɔ ha https://secure.2checkout.com/cpanel/webhooks_api.php.

Wo INS URL no yɛ

#storefront#rt=ntrɛwmu/2checkout/frɛ bio



Afei nso hyehyɛ Redirect URL no na paw Return kwan "Header redirect".

Wo Redirect URL no yɛ

#storefront#rt=checkout/nkonimdi

Ahintasɛm Safoa:
Asɛmfua a ɛyɛ kokoam a wɔde si nnwuma so dua (ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ sɛnea wɔakyerɛkyerɛ mu wɔ aguadifo akontaabu nhyehyɛe krataafa no so no ara pɛ.
Kɔkɔbɔ: Wonni kwan sɛ wobɛsesa sikatua 2Checkout!
